sentence: We stayed at this hotel for our vacation in mid October
There was variety to tempt all tastes from salmon to well seasoned roast pork an ocean of edibles from the sea in colourful salads presented like ribbons reflective of the tastiest Caribbean getaways

Our stay at the holiday inn was great with no complaints what so everWe arrived early and our room was ready Fil on the reception managed to swap our twin room for a double with no problem what so ever
Kensington Holiday Inn is Good Location and Value
Holiday Inn Kensington
We stayed in a group and met for meals and excursions
it is a big business hotel that gets many groups and airline crews and also works for individuals

covenient location and practical room with nice views breakfast not too bad for English standards when asked for extra blankets these were immediately brought to our rominfrastructure old poor shower pressure reception undermanned waited long in order to ask a simple question as a whole group was before us for check in and only one person at reception at around peak moment of 7 pm
I chose the Holiday Inn Kensington Forum for its close proximity to public transportation
This Holiday Inn is located in a very charming area
Negative points There was a fire alarm at 330am and I had to quickly evacuate from my room on the 18th floor went to the 12th floor to pick up my parents and then we went down by stairs
Overall the worst holiday inn experience and I certainly do n’t recommend staying here if on the Cromwell road in London very poor indeed

we stayed in the holiday inn on the 16 to 18 of august and was very disappointed and upset as it was for my birthday we was told that we would get an upgrade but we only got a standard room so I mentioned it while checking in but it was brushed off the room was dirty and it had not been cleaned all the time we was there at the reception checking out I was asked if I have had a nice stay I told her about the upgrade and she asked if I would like a drink to make up for it but we was going home i m very disappointed how we was treated so that put a write dampener on my birthday I was not even given anything for my birthday which me or my husband would normally get for our birthday
Yes indeed so 10 mins after check in I received a knock on the door for the full Holiday Inn executive service a housekeeping staff member brandishing 2 bottles of still water and a KitKat
The rooms are usually OK but this time I must have had a room on the other side from my previous trips
The rooms and the hotel generally are a little tired value for groups but not solo travelers

The staff receptionist was not polite during check in I selected 2 single beds and prepaid They did n’t provide me according to the reservation I can not trust this hotel any more I sent an email to the hotel and they ignored my complaint I may not consider holiday inn in the future
I had no choice at this stage but to leave the payment go from my bank account and lodge in back into my account once home after receiving cash from family members but this should n’t have happened
SHAME ON YOU HOLIDAY INN

A visit to this Holiday Inn was ruined by inept customer service starting with the concierge who advised me to park at another hotel because the car park was full even though I had prepaid for parking at the Kensington Forum
